name: Project Breakout - Beatriz Muniz
description:
Small block-breaking breakout clone for a Digital Games class.

In order to play, press Space to launch ball and use either the arrows or AD to move the paddle.

Credits:

Sprites: Artemouse's Breakout Pixel Pack - https://artemouse.itch.io/breakout-pixel-assets

Background Music: Abstraction's Ludum Dare 32 Loops - https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Sound Effects: FALLENBLOOD's 50 Sound Fx For Your Game - https://fallenblood.itch.io/50-sfx
